name: Arabic Language for Kids
description: Arabic Language for Kids is a great way to learn Arabic for kids between 3 and 15 years old. It is based on the Arabic alphabet and Arabic vocabulary and Maths (addition multiplication subtraction division) and short stories Arabic. Young learners begin by learning the alphabet, and then learn to speak Arabic through situations that relate to their age. This is done by giving them stories and interesting puzzles that revolve around important topics such as jobs, colors, numbers, food, outings, members, etc.   Feature  :  Arabic alphabet. Vocabulary of : animals, shapes, colors, objects and fruits and vegetables Writing alphabets and numbers Maths : addition multiplication subtraction division Maths Test A coloring Arabic Stories  If you have any requests please contact us Enjoy .
